mention.text: an ordinary 15-year-old schoolgirl with an interest in tarot cards and fortune telling
the sky along with a vicious dragon
a mysterious land where the Earth hangs in the sky
a prince of the Kingdom of Fanelia , which soon falls under attack by the evil empire of Zaibach
